name: sql-translator (whoiskatrin)
description: [项目级] SQL Translator is a tool for converting natural language queries into SQL code using artificial intelligence. This project is 100% free and open source.。来源: https://github.com/whoiskatrin/sql-translator

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
SQL Translator is a tool for converting natural language queries into SQL code using artificial intelligence. This project is 100% free and open source.

来源: https://github.com/whoiskatrin/sql-translator
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 4314

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
Dockerfile
LICENSE
README.md
UI.png
components
components/GitHub.tsx
components/Header
components/LoadingDots.tsx
components/ThemeButton.tsx
components/Toggle.tsx
components/atoms

next.config.js
package-lock.json
package.json
pages
pages/_app.tsx
pages/_document.tsx

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
Using the SQL to Natural Language Translator is easy. Simply navigate to the tool's website and choose whether you want to translate from natural language to SQL or from SQL to natural language. Then, type in your query and hit the "translate" button. The tool will generate the corresponding code or text and display it on the screen. 
You can press the 'reverse' button to give input as Natural Language and get SQL queries in response

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Dark mode
- Lowercase/uppercase toggle
- Copy to clipboard
- SQL syntax highlighting
- Schema awareness (beta)
- Query history
